analysis.description:
ERC721 (/unique_contracts/0x139132e99c03d9bce03256796163303603dc1a59.sol#277-293) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0x139132e99c03d9bce03256796163303603dc1a59.sol#287-288)
	-approve (/unique_contracts/0x139132e99c03d9bce03256796163303603dc1a59.sol#288-291)

ERC721Token (/unique_contracts/0x139132e99c03d9bce03256796163303603dc1a59.sol#294-545) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0x139132e99c03d9bce03256796163303603dc1a59.sol#384-387)
	-approve (/unique_contracts/0x139132e99c03d9bce03256796163303603dc1a59.sol#395-404)

TokenGame.receivePrize (/unique_contracts/0x139132e99c03d9bce03256796163303603dc1a59.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_winner,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x139132e99c03d9bce03256796163303603dc1a59.sol)

ERC721Token.ownerOf.owner (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0x139132e99c03d9bce03256796163303603dc1a59.sol#366) shadows:

ERC721Token.approve.owner (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0x139132e99c03d9bce03256796163303603dc1a59.sol#397-398) shadows:
